title: Baja no Studio: Baja no Mita Umi

alternative_titles.ja: バジャのスタジオ~バジャのみた海~

synopsis:
Living in an animation studio fawned over by its staff, Baja and his best friend Ga-chan have all sorts of fun every day. While working on a particularly stressful project, the studio's head director, Kanako, wishes that she could take a trip to the sea. This makes Baja wonder what sort of place the sea might be and if he and Ga-chan could use magic to experience it as well.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
